channel.title: How do i make a admin or mods
channel.description: ok i download tos-scape v3 http://www.megaupload.com/?d=PKQ75GPH and i did the rights 2 thing but it didn't work plz help me just tell me wat to do none of the ones below help

item.title: How do i make a admin or mods
item.dc:creator: @dbmain dbmain
item.description:
@dbmain wrote:

add in

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("your username.")){ playerRights = 2; }

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a admin or mods

item.title: How do i make a admin or mods
item.dc:creator: @JBJr JBJr
item.description:
@JBJr wrote:

[quote=“ownage plz, post:7, topic:106480”][quote author=JBJr link=topic=152448.msg1438134#msg1438134 date=1181094899]
Make sure that the player is logged out.

Go to your character files and find the players name

make sure that you’re at:

character-rights = 0

Then change the 0 to one of these:
0 = regular player
1 = mod
2 = admin
3 = owner/co-owner

Hope that helped.

–JBJr
[/quote]

you forgot 4 = hidden admin ;)[/quote]

Oh thanks I never knew you can have hidden admin

and nfl0, calm down, and dont double post. just make sure the player is logged out, and that you save, but if it doesn work after that, just download a new source.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make a admin or mods
item.dc:creator: @TankedJare TankedJare
item.description:
@TankedJare wrote:

  1. Make sure your server is disconnected.
  2. Change character-rights = 0 to = 2
  3. Save.
  4. COMPILE
  5. Start server
  6. Get him to log in

Read full topic
